au.edu.rmit.agtgrp.apparate.gui.simviewer.model.timer

Class AEnvironTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.rmit.agtgrp.apparate.gui.simviewer.model.timer.AEnvironTimer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PulserTimer, ThreadedTimer

    public abstract class AEnvironTimer
extends Object
    The parent class for a grid environment timer Contains most of the logic for the environment, event and aborting. Need to fill out how the execution is runned
    Author:
    Andy Heng Xie
